item.description:
We are returning to the USS Salem for a great meetup. PLEASE NOTE THE DATE CHANGE: THE EVENT IS NOW SCHEDULED FOR FRIDAY, JUNE 15TH.

Our investigation will begin at 7 p.m. Please be there around 6:30 for check in. We will meet in the parking lot.

The fee for the investigation is $25 pp. Free parking and investigation included.

 Investigation hours are 7 p.m. to 1 a.m.

 All proceeds go to the USS Salem for the upkeep of the ship!

 

This is a great location to investigate.

Come and join New England GHOST team members on an offiical paranormal investigation!

 

 

Payments can be mailed to:

New England GHOST ~ PO Box 365  West Kennebunk, Maine 04094

Checks or Money Orders should be made out to Aimee Rodriguez.

*If you want to go, please send Aimee your payment as soon as possible

because she needs it to prepay the event. 

Thank you!
item.name: USS Salem Investigation~ Quincy, MA (DATE CHANGE: NOW JUNE 15)
